definition: varying in color when seen in different lights or from different angles, the launching of a missile or spacecraft to a specified destination
details:
adjective
- varying in color when seen in different lights or from different angles
= synonyms: iridescent
noun
- the launching of a missile or spacecraft to a specified destination
= synonyms: blastoff
- the act of firing a projectile
= synonyms: shooting
- (sports) the act of swinging or striking at a ball with a club or racket or bat or cue or hand
= synonyms: stroke
- the act of putting a liquid into the body by means of a syringe
= example: the act of putting a liquid into the body by means of a syringe
= synonyms: injection
- informal words for any attempt or effort
= example: informal words for any attempt or effort
= synonyms: stab
- an attempt to score in a game
- a blow hard enough to cause injury
= example: a blow hard enough to cause injury
- a solid missile discharged from a firearm
= example: a solid missile discharged from a firearm
= synonyms: pellet
- an explosive charge used in blasting
- sports equipment consisting of a heavy metal ball used in the shot put
= example: sports equipment consisting of a heavy metal ball used in the shot put
- an informal photograph
= synonyms: snap
- an estimate based on little or no information
= synonyms: dead reckoning
- a consecutive series of pictures that constitutes a unit of action in a film
= synonyms: scene
- an aggressive remark directed at a person and intended to have a telling effect
= example: an aggressive remark directed at a person and intended to have a telling effect
= synonyms: barb
- a person who shoots, usually with respect to their ability to shoot
= example: a person who shoots, usually with respect to their ability to shoot
= synonyms: shooter
- a small drink of liquor
= example: a small drink of liquor
= synonyms: nip
- a chance to do something
= example: a chance to do something
= synonyms: crack
